sample_titles.v5-unofficial-valid: Sample v5-unofficial schema and valid document
sample_titles.draft-04-valid: Sample draft-04 schema and valid document

WARNING_V5_UNOFFICIAL:
The v5-unofficial schema version, provided by Ajv to try experimental features, was previously erroneously named "draft-05".
This is, and will not be, an official JSON Schema version and should not be used. Please see the schema dropdown for the latest official version.
DOCUMENT_VALID_MESSAGE: Document validates against the schema, spec version {{name}}.
ERROR_GIST_FORMAT: Gist is not in JSON Schema Lint format
ERROR_INVALID_JSON: Document is invalid JSON. Try http://jsonlint.com to fix it.
ERROR_INVALID_YAML: Document is invalid YAML. Try http://codebeautify.org/yaml-validator to fix it.
ERROR_MODULE_LOADING_FAILED_CONTENT: We couldn't load a vital part of the application.  This is probably due to network conditions.  We recommend reloading the page once conditions improve.
